title: login issues
body:
I got this login issues that i cant login tried to reinstall lol eaven try to login on my other computer but i got the same login error, i tried to contact the support but they only told me to disable my firewall and it didn't work, my virus protection is off to so idk what is causing this problem thats why i need help to solve it.

here is a link on the screenshot on the error im getting 
http://prntscr.com/fm4c2k

EDIT: My friend tried to login on my account from his home and it worked than its probably something on my internet causing the problem.

replies.body: When an unexpected error appears this is more of an issue with the client connecting to our Server. I would suggesting [Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) that Connection first and if it continues after that reaching back out to the tech team in your ticket.
Im getting the same error iwth the direct x error too. It was fine 30 minutes ago wtf
I'm getting the same error on the same network I always play on.
